getSQL Query
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT co.id, co.temp, co.humi, co.wann, of.oname FROM `compare` AS `co` JOIN `offerer` AS `of` ON co.fk_offerer = of.id ORDER BY co.wann desc LIMIT 0, 5";
    
return msg;

name: getSQL OffererName
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT of.oname, of.id FROM `compare` AS `co` JOIN `offerer` AS `of` ON co.fk_offerer = of.id";
    
return msg;
